Murieta Walkthrough

The North Side

Sunday, Jan 14, 2001

I’m including everything I found during the walkthroughs including "long-term" projects. I’ll indicate these as LT (indicating they won’t get fixed immediately and might need board approval, but nevertheless good things to get on our radar if not already). Sometimes I’ll indicate "north", "east", etc, stairways. This of course is relative to the building itself (and I apologize for not specifying to the level of, say, "northwest").

  1. 39865 (building 5)

General
  • Cracked tiles – outside entrance near intercom (LT).
  • Graffiti scratches on elevator door
  • Burnt out wall light near water fountain
  • Carpet stains – interior stairway between 1st & 2nd floor
  • Shopping cart with trash near 1st floor elevator.
  • Between buildings 5 & 8
  1. Very dirty tiles between Cedar and the gate entrance
  2. Hanging light is burnt out
  3. Raised and cracked tiles, past the gate (LT)
  4. Fountain not working (orange cones inside)
  • Nests, 3rd floor exterior, the West side

 

 

1st Floor
  • Dirty tiles leading up to the elevator.
  • Garbage needs to be collected near elevator.
  • Dirty carpets – from 139 to 143 (bike skid or scooter)
  • Outside glass door (near 143) – outside door handle scratched (LT)
  • Dirty rug near 137
  • Dirty tiles and stairs between 1st & 2nd floors (outside stairs, north side).
  • Dirty fluorescent lights near 136, 134, 132, & between 1st & 2nd floors (outside stairs, north side)

2nd Floor
  • Outside balcony area (north side) – tiles are dirty
  • Carpet stains near 235, 237, 239, 243.
  • Dirty & worn out tiles near 2nd floor elevator.
  • Scratched outside door handle (west side entrance)
  • Tiles dirty in outside stair area (west side entrance)
  • Scratched brown woodwork (railing & balcony rests) between 1st & 2nd floor (outside stair area, west side)
  • Dirty stairs between 1st & 2nd floors (outside, west side)
  • Dirty fluorescent lights near 237, 239, 241, & outside stair area (west side)
  • Between 2nd & 3rd floor (outside stairs area, west side)
  1. very dirty fluorescent light
  2. dirty tiles

3rd Floor

  • 3rd floor outside balcony area (west side)
  1. burnt out fluorescent light
  2. burnt out mini ceiling light
  3. scratched door handle (door scratches the tile when it closes) LT
  • shopping cart – inlet near 339
  • dirty tiles near the elevator
  • facing Cedar (East) near elevator
  1. dirty window
  2. needs a screen (LT)
  • dirty tiles near 337
  • dirty fluorescent lights near 338, 337, 336.
  • Window area (facing West – interior courtyard)
  1. screens need to be fixed
  2. one window needs a screen (LT)
  3. wash the windows
  • outside balcony area (west side)
  1. dirty fluorescent lights
  2. dirty tiles
  3. chipped woodwork
  • between 2nd & 3rd floors: white paint or chalk on outside stairs (west side)

  1. not working
  2. light burnt out

  • Interior stairway area
  1. Wood trim is chipping – 1st floor door (LT)
  2. Dirty walls between 1st & 2nd floor
  3. Burnt out fluorescent light between 2nd & 3rd floors
